task_description: Search for a specific video within the Bilibili app.
Follow a content creator on the Bilibili app.
Like a video on the Bilibili app.
Post a comment on a video within the Bilibili app.
Explore trending videos on the Bilibili app.
Share a video link from the Bilibili app with friends.

Launch the Bilibili app and search for a popular anime series.
Open the Bilibili app and follow your favorite content creator from their profile page.
Start the Bilibili app and like a trending video.
